mapper.select: select blog_title, blog_name, blog_style, blog_create_time, blog_author_mail, blog_author_qq, blog_author_wx, index_top_article_type, index_background from timeblog.time_web_config limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into timeblog.time_web_config(blog_title, blog_name, blog_style, blog_create_time, blog_author_mail, blog_author_qq, blog_author_wx, index_top_article_type, index_background) values (#{blogTitle}, #{blogName}, #{blogStyle}, #{blogCreateTime}, #{blogAuthorMail}, #{blogAuthorQq}, #{blogAuthorWx}, #{indexTopArticleType}, #{indexBackground})
mapper.update:
update timeblog.time_web_config
blog_title = #{blogTitle},
blog_name = #{blogName},
blog_style = #{blogStyle},
blog_create_time = #{blogCreateTime},
blog_author_mail = #{blogAuthorMail},
blog_author_qq = #{blogAuthorQq},
blog_author_wx = #{blogAuthorWx},
